name: ONE 2: BAD*SS EDITION (my mom wont let me swear)

description:
THE ONE 2 EXPORIENCE(TM) IS OUT NAO!!!!!!!!

What does ONE 2 have?!

  • Epic music

How tough is da game?!?!

Reviews from REAL PEOPLE!
